existing_features.title: Add a logged-in user experience that allows an authenticated (non-owner) user to view and update their own personal information stored as the backend UserProfile (currently: name) by calling getCallerUserProfile and saveCallerUserProfile.
Implement React Query hooks to fetch and mutate the caller's UserProfile, including cache invalidation for the existing query key used for the current user profile.
Expose entry points in the existing UI to access the Personal Info editor for authenticated users who are not the portfolio owner, without granting access to the owner-only Admin Edit panel.

new_feature_requests.summary: Allow user to update personal information

projectName: Add UI to update logged-in user's personal info (UserProfile)
